infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera for video calls
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for video calls
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library for sharing images during calls

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for video calls
